level.heading: Regulations.
level.text: The Council of the District of Columbia is authorized to make such rules and regulations as may be necessary to carry out the provisions of the District of Columbia Revenue Act of 1937, as amended and shall prescribe and publish all needful rules and regulations for the enforcement of the Revenue Act of 1939.

level.heading: References in Text
level.text: The District of Columbia Revenue Act of 1937, referred to in this section, is 50 Stat. 673, approved August 17, 1937.
The Revenue Act of 1939, referred to in this section, is 50 Stat. 1087, approved July 26, 1939.
